body:
Hey everyone!

I'll be making you your own avatar in Cinema4D!
Just let me know what background you want, and text (if any) and it'll be coming right up! Also, let me know if you want your character holding anything, also, their pose.

Thanks,
Sky
body_tagged:
Hey everyone!

I'll be making you your own avatar in Cinema4D!
Just let me know what background you want, and text (if any) and it'll be coming right up! Also, let me know if you want your character holding anything, also, their pose.

Thanks,
Sky
title: Cinema4D pic of your MC avatar
